page.title: 19Population.
page.content: During the summer months the population of this part of the town grows because of the tourists, often using the ferries to the continent, and because of the holiday-makers attracted to the four commercial caravan sites and many holiday flats available to rent. There are some travelling people associated with the fairground and Amusements. Many of the newer flats on the sea front have appealed to elderly people retiring from London and other cities, and several of the former hotels and Guest Houses have in recent times been converted into retirement homes. The local Primary School in Langer Road has shrunk from 250 pupils in the mid-70's to just over 150 in 1985.
